name: Beat, loot, repeat
description:
Hi! Beat, loot, repeat is a prototype of an action-rpg I am working on.

Currently it features a fully-built ARPG skill system, which allows creating combat skills with nearly no restrictions.  It also features skill upgrades, skill modifications(for example, making a piercing arrow bounce between multiple enemies instead), gear and passives. Currently there's a single class with 9 different skills and 18 skill modifications.

The rest of the prototype is essentially a playground, where you get to fight enemies and earn new skills/gear. The map is finite, but randomly generated. Your opponents scale as you go, so be careful.

In the future, the game will feature multiplayer, several classes, enemy formations/tactics and a roguelite experience.

I'm also looking for an artist who would like to try their hand at building an arpg. Pixel art preferred :) And no strings attached.
